SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Board of the player which places his/her card it is initialized with an initial Card, it is unique for each player in the game.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructor of the board of each player at the start of the game

    • Board

      public Board(InitialCard i)
      Constructor of the board of each player at the start of the game
      参数:
      i - :Initial card which would be place at the central position of the board; isFront: boolean which represent the face of the card

  • 方法详细资料

    • addCard

      public boolean addCard(ResourceCard input, int x, int y)
      Add the card on the board and count the new elements showed up and deletes the covered ones. This method is used only if the check method is called first and returns true
      参数:
      input - : the card which would be put in the board;front: boolean which indicates the face of the card decided by de player;
      x - :the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired
      返回:
      boolean of the add card status, success or fail

    • check

      public boolean check(int x, int y)
      Check about the coordinates and the coordinate, if there are all free empty corners it returns true, otherwise false This method is used by the player class to check the availability of the board
      参数:
      x - the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired
      返回:
      returns a boolean, if there are all free empty corners, and it is a free slot it returns true, otherwise false

    • checkCorner

      public boolean checkCorner(int x, int y, CornerPosition corner)
      Check selected side of the coordinate , if there is a free empty corner it returns true, otherwise false This method is used by the check method to check the availability of a side of the coordinate
      参数:
      x - the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - coordinate y desired
      corner - corner position that should be checked
      返回:
      boolean returns a boolean, if there is a free empty corners

    • addElement

      public void addElement(Elements element, Integer value)
      method used for adding the number of elements present in the board of the player
      参数:
      element - : the element which number has to be increased;
      value - : the amount of the element which number has to be increased;

    • addElement

      public void addElement(Elements element)
      increase the number of the element of 1
      参数:
      element - : the element which number has to be increased of 1;

    • addAllElements

      public void addAllElements(Card card)
      Add all the elements present in corners of the card selected This method is used by the method addCard, remember that a new card placed also causes elements covered so is suggested to call also the method deleteCoveredElements
      参数:
      card - :card with all elements that would be added in the counter of elements

    • addCornerElement

      public void addCornerElement(Card card, CornerPosition corner)
      Add the upright element present in that corner of the card selected This method is used by the method addCorners, it can also be called to add only an element of the corner indicated Remember that a new card placed also causes elements covered so is suggested to call also the method deleteCoveredElements
      参数:
      card - with the corner selected and its element that would be added in the counter of elements
      corner - the corner selected

    • deleteCoveredElements

      public void deleteCoveredElements(int x, int y)
      Delete from the counter all the covered element in that coordinate there is a card placed This method is used normally after the method addCorners and add Card.
      参数:
      x - :the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired

    • deleteCoveredByCorner

      public void deleteCoveredByCorner(int x, int y, CornerPosition corner)
      Delete from the counter element covered in the coordinate and selected corner where is a card placed This method is used normally used in deleteCoveredElements or after the method addCorners and add Card if there is a single corner covered.
      参数:
      x - :the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired
      corner - : corner position of the card with coordinate x y desired

    • numCardsAbout

      public int numCardsAbout(int x, int y)
      Count the number of cards about the coordinate Is implemented mainly to count the covered card by the gold card with the bonusType of HideCorners
      参数:
      x - :the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired
      返回:
      : int count: quantity of cards about the coordinate

    • isCardCoordinate

      public boolean isCardCoordinate(int x, int y)
      Check if there is a Card in coordinates given
      参数:
      x - :the coordinate x of the position desired;
      y - :coordinate y desired
      返回:
      boolean true if there is a card, otherwise false

    • setCounterOfElements

      public void setCounterOfElements(Map<Elements,Integer> counterOfElements)
      setter of counterOfElements This method set the parameter as Encounter of elements of the Board as substitute of the old one.,
      参数:
      counterOfElements - the counter of Element that will be set

    • getCounterOfElements

      public Map<Elements,Integer> getCounterOfElements()
      Getter of Counter of Elements. This Method will return the counter of elements stored in the players board
      返回:
      : returns the counter of Elements

    • getExists

      public ArrayList<Integer> getExists()
      Getter of Array of integers that represents the card's id in the board.
      返回:
      : returns the Exists array

    • getCardCoordinate

      public com.google.common.collect.BiMap<Card,Coordinate> getCardCoordinate()
      Getter HashBiMap of Card and it's Coordinate in the board
      返回:
      : returns the cardCoordinate BiMap

    • setCardCoordinate

      public void setCardCoordinate(com.google.common.collect.BiMap<Card,Coordinate> cardCoordinate)
      setter of CardCoordinate This method set the parameter as the HashBiMap of cads and the respective coordinate of the Board as substitute of the old one.
      参数:
      cardCoordinate - the map that will be set

    • setExists

      public void setExists(ArrayList<Integer> exists)
      setter of Exists ArrayList of integer This method set the parameter as the Exits Array of Card id of the Board as substitute of the old one.
      参数:
      exists - the ArrayList that will be set

    • getCardInBoard

      public Card getCardInBoard(int x, int y)
      Getter of the card that was played before by his coordinate
      参数:
      x - : position x of the card
      y - : position y of the card
      返回:
      : card in the position given

    • getCoordinate

      public Coordinate getCoordinate(Card card)
      Getter of the Coordinate that the card has
      参数:
      card - : card's position that the method returns
      返回:
      : position of the parameter of the card

    • getCoordinate

      public Coordinate getCoordinate(int cardCode)
      Getter of the Coordinate that the card id has
      参数:
      cardCode - : card's position that the method returns
      返回:
      : position of the parameter of the card id
